summary.span: 衍生自 類別，並由 ASP.NET 用來包含 範本。

span.span: Derived from the class and used by ASP.NET to contain templates.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果行動控制項提供樣板化的轉譯功能，透過裝置範本，它必須建立在不同的控制項類型的每個範本的執行個體。If a mobile control provides templated rendering features through device templates, it must create instances of each template inside a separate control of type . 如果是在範本中，控制項中的資料繫結運算式`Container`變數的運算式一律為型別。If a data-binding expression is in a control in a template, the `Container` variable of the expression is always of type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件，以建立範本內行動表單中的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to create templates within a object in a mobile form. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 所有上面的程式碼都可以使用下列標記以宣告方式取代：All of the code above can be replaced declaratively with the following markup: Web.config 檔案必須有下列幾行：The Web.config file must have the following lines:

summary.span: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性決定控制項之後是否呈現其他尾端分行符號。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.

summary.span: 這個分行符號會使後續內容從下一行開始。

span.span: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
The default is .
